definition: Zadok (son of Azor and father of Achim in Matthew 1:13)
to let go/to cast/to let loose/to discharge/to give expression to

sentences.english: therefore it shall be, that what thing soever thou shalt hear out of the king's house, thou shalt tell it to Zadok and Abiathar the priests.
sentences.chinese: 你在王宫里听见什么，就要告诉祭司撒督和亚比亚他。

sentences.english: After them repaired Zadok the son of Immer over against his house.
sentences.chinese: 其次是音麦的儿子，撒督对着自己的房屋修造。

sentences.english: 45 and Zadok the priest and Nathan the prophet have anointed him king at Gihon.
sentences.chinese: 祭司撒督和先知拿单在基训已经膏他作王。

sentences.english: And next unto them repaired Zadok the son of Baana.
sentences.chinese: 其次是巴拿的儿子撒督修造。

sentences.english: And Zadok, a young man mighty of valour, and of his father's house twenty and two captains.
sentences.chinese: 还有少年大能的勇士撒督，同着他的有族长二十二人。

sentences.english: And hast thou not there with thee Zadok and Abiathar the priests?
sentences.chinese: 祭司撒督和亚比亚他岂不都在那里吗。

sentences.english: Zadok, a young man mighty in valor, and twenty-two commanders from his own fathers' house.
sentences.chinese: 还有少年大能的勇士撒督，同著他的有族长二十二人。

sentences.english: 28 and Zadok, a brave young warrior, with 22 officers from his family;
sentences.chinese: 还有少年大能的勇士撒督，同着他的有族长二十二人。

sentences.english: His mother's name was Jerusha daughter of Zadok.
sentences.chinese: 他母亲名叫耶路沙，是撒督的女儿。

sentences.english: There have Zadok the priest and Nathan the prophet anoint him king over Israel.
sentences.chinese: 在那里，祭司撒督和先知拿单要膏他作以色列的王。

definition: Jehu (842-815 BC), Israelite king, prominent character in 2 Kings 9:10
Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
Ahab (9th c. BC), King of Israel, son of Omri and husband of Jezebel, prominent figure in 1 Kings 16-22
